welcome_message_body: Welcome to Livorno, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful canals, historical architecture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Livorno has to offer during your visit. Buon viaggio!

restaurants.name: Antica Torteria al Mercato - da Gagarin
restaurants.description: Antica Torteria al Mercato - da Gagarin is a pizzeria located in Livorno.

restaurants.name: Melafumo
restaurants.description: Melafumo is a seafood restaurant located in Livorno.

restaurants.name: Ristorante Gennarino
restaurants.description: Ristorante Gennarino is a italian restaurant located in Livorno.

restaurants.name: La Casina di Alice
restaurants.description: La Casina di Alice is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Livorno.

restaurants.name: Osteria della Venezia
restaurants.description: Osteria della Venezia is a italian restaurant located in Livorno.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, mainly used for charter and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
